column4: would aynone know by what mechanism the sidebar color changes through wallpaper change? i'd like my gnome-terminal color to change with it as well.
I don't believe that last part is possible, as the Unity Sidebar partly does that with Compiz.
everything is possible with a little bit of code, or so i believe. i'm just curious about the mechanism tbh.
yes, part of the mechanism is Compiz, not sure about what else, though.
